mapper.select: SELECT COUPON_TYPE_CODE,COUPON_TYPE_NAME FROM STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_COUPON_TYPE_DIC WHERE STATE = 'E' AND IS_DELETE = 1
SELECT GOODS_TYPE_CODE,GOODS_TYPE_NAME FROM STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_GOODS_TYPE_DIC WHERE STATE = 'E' AND IS_DELETE = 1
mapper.update: update STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_COUPON set IS_DELETE = 0 , STATE = 'D' where COUPON_CODE = #{COUPON_CODE}
mapper.select:
SELECT TEMP.COUPON_CODE,TEMP.USE_TIMES_FLAG,TEMP.TOTAL_USE_TIMES,TEMP.VALID_USE_TIMES, TEMP.VALID_DATE_FALG,TEMP.START_DATE,TEMP.END_DATE,TEMP.USED_TIMES,TEMP.OVER_FLAG, TEMP.COUPON_TYPE_CODE,C.COUPON_TYPE_NAME,B.REBATE_CAL,D.GOODS_TYPE_CODE,TEMP.IS_DELETE,TEMP.STATE FROM STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_COUPON TEMP LEFT JOIN STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_COUPON_REBATE_DETAIL B ON TEMP.COUPON_CODE=B.COUPON_CODE LEFT JOIN STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_COUPON_TYPE_DIC C ON TEMP.COUPON_TYPE_CODE = C.COUPON_TYPE_CODE
LEFT JOIN (SELECT GOODSTYPEREL.COUPON_CODE AS COUPON_CODE,','||TO_CHAR(WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(GOODSTYPE.GOODS_TYPE_CODE))||',' AS GOODS_TYPE_CODE FROM STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_COUPON_GOODSTYPE_REL GOODSTYPEREL LEFT JOIN STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_GOODS_TYPE_DIC GOODSTYPE ON GOODSTYPE.GOODS_TYPE_CODE = GOODSTYPEREL.GOODS_TYPE_CODE WHERE GOODSTYPE.IS_DELETE=1 AND GOODSTYPE.STATE='E' GROUP BY GOODSTYPEREL.COUPON_CODE ) D ON TEMP.COUPON_CODE = D.COUPON_CODE WHERE TEMP.COUPON_CODE=#{COUPON_CODE}
mapper.update: update STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_COUPON set USED_TIMES = #{USED_TIMES} where COUPON_CODE = #{COUPON_CODE}
